# Introduction to Python

```{python}
#| label: python-list
fruits = ['apple', 'banana', 'cherry']
print(f'First fruit: {fruits[0]}')
```

```{python}
#| label: python-for-loop
for fruit in fruits:
    print(f'I like {fruit}')
```
